title: 20 Simple But Very Real Reasons To Be A Feminist
cleaned_text: Founded in 2010, Thought Catalog is owned and operated by The Thought & Expression Company, Inc. For over a decade, we've been at the bleeding edge of media, pioneering an infrastructure for creatives to flourish both artistically and financially.

opengraph.title: 20 Simple But Very Real Reasons To Be A Feminist
opengraph.description: Feminism gets misrepresented by a small minority of radicals. Most feminists are not anti-men and seek to help male issues as well.
